articles.title: Bitcoin nears record high ahead of futures ETF listing - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Bitcoin, the world’s biggest cryptocurrency by market value, rose as far as 1.5% during the Asia session to $62,991, its strongest level since the record peak of $64,895 in April.
articles.content: Bitcoin hit a six-month high and was within striking distance of a record on Tuesday as traders bet an anticipated listing of a futures-based U.S. exchange traded fund could herald investment flows i… [+2018 chars]

articles.title: Malaysia’s retirement income system third best in Asia, global pension index finds - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 19 — Malaysia’s retirement system has been ranked third in Asia and 23rd globally despite a slight decrease in the country’s overall index value from 60.1 in 2020 to 59.6 in 2021, the 13th annual Mercer CFA Institute Global Pension Index (MC…
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: AirAsia X proposes to pay 0.5% of RM34bil debt owed to creditors - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) is proposing to pay just 0.5% of debt owed to each of its creditors and to terminate all existing contracts so that it can restructure RM33.65bil of liabilities, a document seen by Reuters shows.

articles.title: This Bugis confectionery store will teach you how to make Squid Game-themed ang ku kueh - AsiaOne
articles.description:
It has been around a month since South Korean drama Squid Game was first released on Netflix and the hype is still going strong. 

In hopes of riding on the trend, business from cafes to seafood restaurants have come up with their own renditions of Squid Ga…
